summary: PWA-related changes were added (new Vite config, manifest updates, and service-worker logic), but the diff also includes many unrelated UI/feature modifications. The required icon image files themselves are not evidenced as added/updated in the provided diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Provide proper PNG icon assets at 192x192 and 512x512 and ensure manifest references match the real image dimensions.
missing_requirements.reason: The manifest was updated to reference 192x192 and 512x512 PNGs, but the diff summary does not show the required image files being added/updated, so their existence and correct dimensions cannot be verified from the diff.

hallucinated_features.description: Large set of UI/UX redesign and layout/navigation changes across multiple components (login screen, profile modal, header/sidebar, task/calendar views, dialogs, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is focused on PWA enablement (service worker build/installability/offline behavior/manifest icons) and explicitly aims to avoid breaking existing functionality; these UI and navigation changes are not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Behavioral changes to React Query hooks (optimistic updates/rollback changes for task completion).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested as part of PWA enablement; introduces functional changes unrelated to service worker/manifest/installability.

hallucinated_features.description: Vite dev server port set to 3000 and path alias '@' added.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest; PWA requirements only ask for Vite config changes needed for service worker bundling/asset handling.
